ygData.subject: RE: Abashi's Thread
ygData.msgSnippet: gee thanks man, this is the message i got... We have noted your attempt to hack this forum. Authorities will be notified if you persist. wtf? Shada
ygData.messageBody:
gee thanks man, this is the message i got...

"We have noted your attempt to hack this forum. Authorities will be notified
if you persist."

wtf?

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
